result.title: Innovation and Exploitation Plan
result.description: This deliverable will hold the plan on identifying and driving the innovation and commercial potential for the technical work and technical goals of the project, providing common framework for innovation and driving towards commercial exploitation for the efforts and results from all technical work packages. Moreover, the plan will describe the process by which identification of potential innovation and commercial exploitation inhibitors, within and between the work packages, is going to take place. Finally, the process and procedures by which the summaries for the periodic reports and annual reports, as well as for the reviews are to be produced.
